project.name: ta11y

rules.description: A document must not include both a â€œmetaâ€ element with an â€œhttp-equivâ€ attribute whose value is â€œcontent-typeâ€, and a â€œmetaâ€ element with a â€œcharsetâ€ attribute.
The â€œtypeâ€ attribute for the â€œstyleâ€ element is not needed and should be omitted.
Consider adding a â€œlangâ€ attribute to the â€œhtmlâ€ start tag to declare the language of this document.
Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
rules.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

rules.description: Ensures the document has only one main landmark and each iframe in the page has at most one main landmark
rules.help: Document must have one main landmark

rules.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
rules.help: All page content must be contained by landmarks

crawl.description: Whether or not to crawl additional pages.

maxVisit.description: Maximum number of pages to visit while crawling.

sameOrigin.description: Whether or not to only consider crawling links with the same origin as the root URL.

blacklist.description: Optional blacklist of URL [glob patterns](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) to ignore.

whitelist.description: Optional whitelist of URL [glob patterns](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) to only include.

viewport.description: Set the browser window's viewport dimensions and/or resolution.

emulateDevice.description:
Emulate a specific device type.
- Use the `name` property from one of the built-in [devices](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/lib/DeviceDescriptors.js).
- Overrides `viewport` and `userAgent`.

referer.description:
Referer header value.
If provided it will take preference over the referer header value set by
[page.setExtraHTTPHeaders()](#pagesetextrahttpheadersheaders).

waitUntil.default: load Navigation is consider when the `load` event is fired.

timeout.description: Maximum navigation time in milliseconds, pass 0 to disable timeout.

deviceScaleFactor.description: Specify device scale factor (can be thought of as dpr).

isMobile.description: Whether the `meta viewport` tag is taken into account.

hasTouch.description: Specifies if viewport supports touch events.

isLandscape.description: Specifies if viewport is in landscape mode.

definition.title: audit
definition.description:
Runs an accessibility audit against the given URL or raw HTML, optionally crawling the
site to discover additional pages and auditing those too.

Must provide either `url` or `html`.

Defaults to running all audit suites.

https://example.com.content:
Example Domain

This domain is for use in illustrative examples in documents. You may use this domain in literature without prior coordination or asking for permission.

More information...

rules.description: A document must not include both a â€œmetaâ€ element with an â€œhttp-equivâ€ attribute whose value is â€œcontent-typeâ€, and a â€œmetaâ€ element with a â€œcharsetâ€ attribute.
The â€œtypeâ€ attribute for the â€œstyleâ€ element is not needed and should be omitted.
Consider adding a â€œlangâ€ attribute to the â€œhtmlâ€ start tag to declare the language of this document.
Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
rules.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

rules.description: Ensures the document has only one main landmark and each iframe in the page has at most one main landmark
rules.help: Document must have one main landmark

rules.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
rules.help: All page content must be contained by landmarks

definition.title: auditExtractResults
definition.description:
Runs an accessibility audit against previously extracted website contents from
[`@ta11y/extract`](https://github.com/saasify-sh/ta11y/tree/master/packages/ta11y-extract).

Defaults to running all audit suites.

https://example.com.content:
Example Domain

This domain is for use in illustrative examples in documents. You may use this domain in literature without prior coordination or asking for permission.

More information...

crawl.description: Whether or not to crawl additional pages.

maxVisit.description: Maximum number of pages to visit while crawling.

sameOrigin.description: Whether or not to only consider crawling links with the same origin as the root URL.

blacklist.description: Optional blacklist of URL [glob patterns](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) to ignore.

whitelist.description: Optional whitelist of URL [glob patterns](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) to only include.

viewport.description: Set the browser window's viewport dimensions and/or resolution.

emulateDevice.description:
Emulate a specific device type.
- Use the `name` property from one of the built-in [devices](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/lib/DeviceDescriptors.js).
- Overrides `viewport` and `userAgent`.

referer.description:
Referer header value.
If provided it will take preference over the referer header value set by
[page.setExtraHTTPHeaders()](#pagesetextrahttpheadersheaders).

waitUntil.default: load Navigation is consider when the `load` event is fired.

timeout.description: Maximum navigation time in milliseconds, pass 0 to disable timeout.

deviceScaleFactor.description: Specify device scale factor (can be thought of as dpr).

isMobile.description: Whether the `meta viewport` tag is taken into account.

hasTouch.description: Specifies if viewport supports touch events.

isLandscape.description: Specifies if viewport is in landscape mode.

definition.title: extract
definition.description:
Extracts the content of a given URL or raw HTML, optionally crawling the site to
discover additional pages and extracting those too.

Must provide either `url` or `html`.

features.name: Accessibility as a service
features.desc: Audit your websites with a range of test suites including WCAG 2.0/2.1 A, AA, AAA, Section 508, HTML validation, as well as our own best practices.

features.name: Automated accessibility testing
features.desc: Save time by automating the bulk of accessibility and conformance testing. Run manual tests during development and then integrate into any CI pipeline.

features.name: Runs in any environment
features.desc: Easy integration that supports localhost, firewalls, custom auth, as well as any public production environment.

features.name: Modern dynamic websites
features.desc: Ta11y treats all websites as dynamic with full script support, so you'll test pages as users actually experience them.

features.name: Free to try
features.desc: Simple to get started for free with our [CLI](https://github.com/saasify-sh/ta11y/tree/master/packages/ta11y), then [sign up](/pricing) once you're ready to remove rate limits.

features.name: Private & secure
features.desc: Ta11y is built with state-of-the-art serverless functions and never stores any of your data or audit results.

saas.name: ta11y
saas.heading: Modern Accessibility Audits
saas.subheading: A complete solution for ensuring your websites conform to the latest standards & best practices.
